model

Class Tower

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Tower

  • public class Tower
extends java.lang.Object
    Tower class is the software manifest of physical Guard Tower. Tower class contains the basic motor and sensor assimilations and base methods for moving mechanical parts.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Joonas Taivalmaa, Torsti Laine, Patrik Heinonen

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tower

        public Tower()
        This is the constructor, which assimilates motors and sensors in their ports. It also creates a new instance of DataConnector class for itself.

    • Method Detail

      • setScannermode

        public void setScannermode()
        This method is used to turn on scannermode, which is default mode of operation.

      • startMotors

        public void startMotors()
        This method starts motors, and sets initial speeds and rotation directions for them.

      • stopMotors

        public void stopMotors()
        This method stops all motors.

      • azimuthTurn

        public void azimuthTurn(boolean direction,
                        int speed)
        This method turns tower horizontally in set direction and speed
        Parameters:
        direction - is either clockwise(true) or counterclockwise(false)
        speed - is the speed which tower will be rotating.

      • azimuthAngleTurn

        public void azimuthAngleTurn(int angle)
        this method turns tower horizontally by set angle. It also sends the new angle to controlling device.
        Parameters:
        angle - is desired turning. Note that it is not degrees.

      • setElevation

        public void setElevation(int angle)
        This method adjusts towers elevation angle.
        Parameters:
        angle - must be between 0 and 190 higher angle is more elevated.

      • fire

        public void fire()
        this method launches projectile. It also sends data about firing incident to controlling device.

      • burstFire

        public void burstFire()
        This method launches three projectiles in rapid succession. Also sends data about firing incident to controlling device.

      • elevationChange

        public void elevationChange(boolean direction,
                            int speed)
        This method causes the robot to adjust the vertical angle of its body.
        Parameters:
        direction - is desired direction of change(up = true or down = false).
        speed - controls how rapidly the angle changes

      • azimuthStop

        public void azimuthStop()
        This method stops azimuth motor thus ceasing horizontal movement

      • elevationStop

        public void elevationStop()
        This method stop elevation motor thus ceasing elevation movement

      • closeMotors

        public void closeMotors()
        This method shuts down motors. they cannot be used before restart.

      • getSensorSample

        public float[] getSensorSample(int sampletype)
        With this method, one can obtain different sample readings from the robot's IR-sensors.
        Parameters:
        sampletype - (0 = distance to target, 1 = horizontal angle to target, 2 = vertical angle to target)
        Returns:
        float[] sample

      • enableConnection

        public void enableConnection()
        This method waits for connection on controlling device and establishes a connection protocol.

      • readLine

        public java.lang.String readLine()
        This method waits for input from controlling device, and returns it
        Returns:
        String control input

      • getAzimuthTacho

        public int getAzimuthTacho()
        This method returns tacho count from azimuth motor.
        Returns:
        int tacho count of azimuth motor.

      • getElevationTacho

        public int getElevationTacho()
        This method returns tacho count of elevation motor.
        Returns:
        int tacho count of elevation motor.

      • getScannermode

        public boolean getScannermode()

      • setNextAngle

        public void setNextAngle(int angle)

      • getNextAngle

        public int getNextAngle()

      • getUserFire

        public boolean getUserFire()

      • setUserFire

        public void setUserFire(boolean userFire)

      • getSnDMode

        public boolean getSnDMode()

      • setSnDMode

        public void setSnDMode(boolean snDmode)

      • resetVerticalTacho

        public void resetVerticalTacho()

      • getVerticalTacho

        public int getVerticalTacho()

      • elevationChange

        public void elevationChange(int angle)

      • getStopCommand

        public boolean getStopCommand()

      • setStopCommand

        public void setStopCommand(boolean stopCommand)

      • getBurstfire

        public boolean getBurstfire()

      • setBurstfire

        public void setBurstfire(boolean burstfire)

      • getUsermode

        public boolean getUsermode()

      • setUsermode

        public void setUsermode(boolean usermode)
        This method takes boolean as parameter. If true, it sets scannermode and towermode booleans off, and usermode on. If false, it sets usermode off.

      • sendLine

        public void sendLine(java.lang.String line)
        This method sends String to controlling device
        Parameters:
        line - is string that will be sent.
